content.content: There is always a lot going on and I am sure that not everyone was able to attend every conference. So I thought to share with you a brief overview of various talks Maker CU members (@SES-Core-Unit @Protocol-Engineering @dux-core-unit ) did during Devconnect (Apr 18-25th) in Amsterdam for you to catch up on. Chronologically: ETHday April 18th Agenda Notion – The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Stream ETH DAY · StreamETH   Lenka (SES) - panel Learn from the serial DAOists Lenka Hudakova (SES Maker), Rolf Hoefer (Metacartel), Ryan Coordinator (Developer DAO), Andrej Berlin (Deep Work) Jonathan Knegtel mod  photo_2022-04-25_22-54-311280×960 183 KB    Lenka (SES) - talk How to create your dream job in crypto/Web3 Shared some of the decentralized workforce research highlights combined with my experiences while working & hiring in the space. The outcome is a set of actionable strategies to pursue for people looking to join the space, outlining how one can shape own dream job in a proactive way, rather than waiting for getting the job as a response to a job ad. Slides Dream job talk I ETHday AMS   Lenka (SES) - Panel Working in Web3 Lenka Hudakova (SES Maker), Maria Magenes (Oasis, Balancer), Ryan Cooridnator (Developer DAO), Jonathan Knegtel mod   — GGG DAOist April 19th Agenda GGG schedule Recordings The DAOist's Global Governance Gathering . Amsterdam 2022 - YouTube   Lenka (SES) - Open hours: Building healthy teams Lenka part of the People Ops guild (people jamming on contributor topics in DAOs) https://twitter.com/TheDAOist_/status/1516355691203674113 No recording! But the 3 main questions were: -How do you overcommunicate successfully in a DAO? -How do you balance a revolving door of contibutors with liquid roles vs small focused teams with very dedicated roles? -What are the best practices around performance reviews in decentralized orgs?   Wouter (SES) - talk on Breaking the Dunbar’s barrier at MakerDAO Since the dissolution of the Foundation, the Maker community has been working hard to scale up the DAO beyond the Dunbar number. This introduces significant coordination challenges. I want to talk about the difficulties we faced, what we’ve learned throughout this journey, and offer these as takeaways for other projects following a decentralization compass. Recording The DAOist's GGG . Day 2 Main Stage (Part 2) - YouTube  photo_2022-04-25_22-43-321280×960 201 KB    Deniz (DUX) - talk on Solving common DAO governance challenges Sneak peek of the new voting portal TLDR on the workshop (incl Element, Yearn, Orca, Livepeer, Radicle, Other Internet, etc.) 3 core problem areas:    Onboarding Accountability Participation Recording The DAOist's GGG . Day 2 Main Stage (Part 2) - YouTube  photo_2022-04-25_22-10-381280×576 134 KB    — Layer 2 Amsterdam 19th   amsterdam.l2beat.com    Layer Two Amsterdam Layer Two Amsterdam is a two-day technical conference dedicated to Ethereum L2 Scaling.       Bartek (PECU) - Talk Introducing Risk Framework 2.0 Talk recording Layer Two Amsterdam · StreamETH (Morning talk, at -2:18:51 time mark)  — MEV Day 22nd Agenda https://mevday.org/ Stream mev.day · StreamETH  Sam (PECU) - panel on Wallets, aggregators & dApps.   Moderator thegostep Flashbots Panelists: hexonaut @MakerDAO, Skeletor Spaceman @Yearn, Aleksandras Gaska @BlockWallet, Simon Brown @Consensys, Felix Leupold @Cowswap  photo_2022-04-25_22-09-241280×1029 95.1 KB    Note: This non-exhaustive list is limited to recorded content. A lot more happened during the week  (DAIvinity, ladies brunch, etc.) and we also got a lot of work done!   photo_2022-04-25_22-58-46960×1280 207 KB
